Is CAPSLOCK/Precision controls on?  It was changed to only allow a tiny fraction of control deflection instead of slowly moving towards full deflection for some reason, so for planes it effectively means you can't maneuver at all.

There is a fully working plane in the stock of vehicle available as example: if AZEQSD (or qwerty equivalent) does nothing for you at all, double check your capslock, keyboard language, etc.

Or you might have found a bug specific to your hardware config .
I had this moment. Somehow in most cases plane use controls IJKL NH, what is quite uncomfortable than WASD layout
